description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the elevation of privilege vulnerability associated with the Windows DWM core library (CVE-2024-30032), apply the following update packages:

1. For Windows 11 Version 23H2, apply KB5037771.
2. For Windows 11 Version 22H2, apply KB5037771.
3. For Windows 11 Version 21H2, apply KB5037770.
4. For Windows 10 (both x64 and 32-bit systems), apply KB5037788.
5. For Windows 10 Version 22H2, apply KB5037768.
6. For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (both x64 and 32-bit systems), apply KB5037768.

**Details**:
- This fix addresses a use-after-free vulnerability that could allow an attacker to elevate their privileges.
- The affected versions include multiple builds of Windows 10 and Windows 11, as specified in the post. 
- Download the update packages from the Microsoft Update Catalog:
  - [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
  - [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
  - [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
  - [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that the system is running a specified supported version of Windows.
- Backup important data before proceeding with the update installation.
